scripts.migrate: npx prisma db push && npx prisma generate
scripts.create-diff:win: powershell -Command "git diff --cached -- . ':(exclude)node_modules' ':(exclude)package-lock.json' ':(exclude)src/app/fonts' ':(exclude)public' | Out-File -FilePath $env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\diff.txt; git ls-files --others --exclude-standard ':(exclude)node_modules' ':(exclude)package-lock.json' ':(exclude)src/app/fonts' ':(exclude)public' | ForEach-Object { Write-Output ('+++ ' + $_); Get-Content $_ } | Out-File -FilePath $env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\diff.txt -Append"
scripts.create-diff:mac: { git diff -- . ':(exclude)node_modules' ':(exclude)package-lock.json' ':(exclude)src/app/fonts' ':(exclude)public' && git ls-files --others --exclude-standard ':(exclude)node_modules' ':(exclude)package-lock.json' ':(exclude)src/app/fonts' ':(exclude)public' | while read file; do echo "+++ $file"; cat "$file"; done; } > ~/Desktop/diff.txt
